attributes.action: Aknowledge the level frustration in the UK caused by the April 09 budget and provide us a forum with which to voice our opinion officially
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the budget announced in April 2009 attracting a large level of attention in the press. I would like to petition the government to provide a voting forum with which to voice our approval /disapproval of the methods used to manage public finances.

Taking on the level of debt that the Chancellor has indicated will cripple the uk economy for a generation and I believe it is only honourable to let that generation have a voice. Bring forward the election to Autumn 2009 or provide an alternative and country wide vote on the actions in the budget followed by a consultation period involving business leaders and representatives of the 3 main political parties to discuss the various options.
